item.title: Productive College Life II: Organization
item.description: Organizing your college life can be incredibly daunting. When I began as a freshman I can distinctly remember being overwhelmed by the sheer amount of new information being thrown at me daily. I now finally feel like I have a few methods for staying on top of my game and keeping my stress levels lower. So let’s explore how systematically keeping track of your schedule, emails, and files can keep your workflow as streamlined and efficient.
